title: What are common emojis we’re using wrong? - Quora

response.answer_text: 😢This may look like a crying face, but it actually depicts anxiety and stress. 🤗Did you think those were jazz hands? Nah. He just wants a hug. 😋They’re not joking, they’re just enjoying their food. 🙀This looks like a terrified cat, but it’s just weary. 🙌No prayers, just celebration. 😤No, not frustration! This really shows a look of triumph. 😲It’s just a quiet and shushed face. 😗Some people think it’s whistling; it’s just awkwardly kissing. 🙏It can be used to pray, or to use your manners like saying please or thank you, but it’s not a high-five. 😩No whining or frustration here, just exhaustion. ✌️Misused as the peace sign, this actually shows victory. Source: 25 Common Emojis You're Using Wrong Have a yummy day, Sarika
